snippet: Juuse Saros helped Finland beat Canada in the world junior hockey semifinals, making 23 saves in a 5-1 victory in Malmo, Sweden.
abstract: Finland beats Canada, 5-1, in the world junior hockey semifinals in Malmo, Sweden.
lead_paragraph: Juuse Saros helped Finland beat Canada in the world junior hockey semifinals, making 23 saves in a 5-1 victory in Malmo, Sweden.

headline.main: Finnish Juniors Advance to Hockey Finals
